commands.script:
import subprocess

# Command with shell
result = subprocess.run('export RD_URL="https://bdias.pd-sandbox.com/"', shell=True, capture_output=True, text=True)
result = subprocess.run('export RD_TOKEN="@option.paop-token@""', shell=True, capture_output=True, text=True)
result = subprocess.run('rd -V', shell=True, capture_output=True, text=True)


# Capture the output
print("stdout:", result.stdout)
print("stderr:", result.stderr)
print("Return code:", result.returncode)
